author: Jay

review: I ordered one of these as soon as I heard about them on day 1. I liked at the time that they offered the Netflix deal as well. However, even without this deal (Google took it away), this little device is totally worth the very small price. I would get another one if my second TV could receive Wi-Fi where it is. So at some point if the price is the same i'll by another.The added benefit is that it does work with Android and iPhone (probably any i-device). It also works with the PC with a Chrome browser. The apps have the built in icon that lets you stream the content to the TV, so once the source is playing, your device is OK to use again. Basically it works by telling the Chromecast where the source is so it does not come from your phone/tablet.At this time, Netflix, YouTube, Google Music and Chrome browser are supported. I have not tried watching Amazon or Hulu through the browser.
